entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carlyle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
